WRITING.TEXT: I think I prefer that too. My problem with doing that on the Matilda cover though is that any color of type I use for the author's name seems to be kinda hard to read against the bedding.

WRITING.TITLE: Book cover designs in need of crit
WRITING.TEXT: I added type to two book cover Illustrations I did, and made a few alternate versions for each. http://imgur.com/a/aFiZS I was thinking of showing them at an interview for a book publishing design internship I have this week. Any advice would be appeciated!
Hey there, great taste in shows :). I'd love to create this thoughtful gift for you. You can view my portfolio at www.subject1656.com

Hey there, I'm very good at mimicking styles and would love to create this gift for you. You can see my work at www.subject1656.com and www.subject1656.tumblr.com (I have more examples of cats here). Feel free to contact me if interested!
Hey there, I can do a stylized or a more realistic painting of you guys depending on what you'd like. You can see my portfolio at www.subject1656.com. Feel free to contact me if interested.
